definition: to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint

sentences.english: Shu new waiting for quality inspection bureau report, suggesting JiangFan not casually.
sentences.chinese: 舒新等候质检局的报告，提示姜凡不能漫不经心。

sentences.english: Our quality inspector is a college graduate.
sentences.chinese: 我们的质检员是位大学毕业生。

sentences.english: Note :Sources is from Guangdong Province silkworm eggs inspection station.
sentences.chinese: 资料来源为广东省蚕种质检站。

sentences.english: The specific administration measures will be promulgated by the AQSIQ separately.
sentences.chinese: 具体管理办法由国家质检总局另行规定。

sentences.english: The Group has its own tobacco scientific research institute and station of tobacco quality inspection.
sentences.chinese: 集团拥有自己的烟草科研所和卷烟质检站。

sentences.english: All products HAs to go through five checks in the all process.
sentences.chinese: 所有产业商品在整个生产过程中得通过五道质检关。

sentences.english: The ministry of oil, packaging department and qc, practiced dustless workshop management.
sentences.chinese: 喷油部，包装部和质检部，都实行无尘车间管理。

sentences.english: It was found out two months ago by a lady quingity inspector surnamed Yang.
sentences.chinese: 两个月前一名姓杨的质检员发现了这种物质。

sentences.english: Carefully the quality inspector is to ensure the quality of our products.
sentences.chinese: 细心的质检员则是我们产品质量的保证。

sentences.english: The rocket will be loaded with fuel after an overall quality review and approval of the mission headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 在通过全面质检和总部指示后，火箭将加注燃料。

sentences.english: It was found out two months ago by a woman quality inspector surnamed Yang.
sentences.chinese: 两个月前一名姓杨的质检员发现了这种物质。

sentences.english: I once worked as a QC Inspector in the Sino-American company for 5 years.
sentences.chinese: 我曾在一家中美合资公司当了5年的质检员。

sentences.english: The high salary invites Skilled tailoring labor, quality testing, backman.
sentences.chinese: 高薪诚聘熟练缝纫工，质检员，辅助工。

sentences.english: All products have to go through five checks in the whole process。
sentences.chinese: 所有产品在整个生产过程中得通过五道质检关。

sentences.english: We have a quality department with five inspectors.
sentences.chinese: 我们有质保部，有五个质检员。

definition: quality control (QC), abbr. for 品質控制|品质控制
random inspection/to do a spot check
to test a random sample/to spot-check
